component.name: hDel
component.description: delete one or more hash fields

component.name: hExists
component.description: determine if a hash field exists

component.name: hGet
component.description: get the value of a hash field

component.name: hGetAll
component.description: get all the fields and values in a hash

component.name: hIncrBy
component.description: increment the integer value of a hash field by the given number

component.name: hKeys
component.description: get all the fields in a hash

component.name: hLen
component.description: get the number of fields in a hash

component.name: hMGet
component.description: get the values of all the given hash fields

component.name: hMSet
component.description: set multiple hash fields to multiple values

component.name: hSet
component.description: set the string value of a hash field

component.name: hSetnX
component.description: set the value of a hash field, only if the field does not exist

component.name: hVals
component.description: get all the values in a hash
